A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi takes risks not taken in The Force Awakens\, which his bound to upset some (or apparently a significant number of) fans. But to me\, the risks paid off. It plays things very smart\, redeeming in many ways plot holes and inconsistencies in the prequels\, and above all righting the the gradual loss of the original focus/philosophy behind Star Wars over the years. Minus half a star for how some characters were handled.
